Key Match Events: Aaron Civale and Aaron Ashby combined on a two-hit shutout
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers Manager Pat Murphy expressed confidence in the team's ability to compete despite doubts
Giants Manager Bob Melvin acknowledged the poor performance of his team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers won two of three games against the Giants
The Giants fell below.500 after a 2-4 trip
Garrett Mitchell homered for the Brewers
Jackson Chourio drove in two runs
Garrett Mitchell hit a one-out homer to right-center
Gary Sanchez walked before advancing to third on a Joey Ortiz double and scoring on Blake Perkins' sacrifice fly
Civale (5-8) worked seven innings for his longest outing of the season
Ashby pitched two perfect innings, striking out three
The Brewers scored two runs in the second off Hayden Birdsong (3-4)
